Articles.Content:
I made a short video on for Instagram to get more people interested in KSP. I hope you enjoy it. ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)

[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B75_96JZ1yYRV0lCOWRVdGFEZzg/view](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B75_96JZ1yYRV0lCOWRVdGFEZzg/view)

Also, how can I improve, or any thoughts? 

Thanks for watching! And if you are interested in my Instagram profile, My username is cutlercollin99.

i cant watch the video. for me to watch it, would require me to be apart of the google machine, and i dont trust google. if you placed the video in a location that did not require selling my soul to google, id watch it.

> 
> i cant watch the video. for me to watch it, would require me to be apart of the google machine, and i dont trust google. if you placed the video in a location that did not require selling my soul to google, id watch it.

Why do you hate Google?
Simple. They are constantly watching, cataloguing, taking notes and recording everything we do thats linked to anything google or internet. Its not natural and suspicious.
Sorry. I think I now changed the Google thing so it can be viewe from anywhere.
Ok, neat video. Nice soundtrack too
Could stand to be a bit longer, but it's fine.
